author: mmartinec
msg: Also (just in case): avoid join then splitting of exec arguments
on whitespace, which can potentially let external data to get split
into more than one command line argument.

author: mmartinec
msg: Use untaint_var() for explicit untainting, see bug 5645

author: jmsnell
msg: entry.setContent(dataHandler,mediaType) was not working correctly.  The passed in media type was being dropped.

author: jmsnell
msg: entry.setContent(dataHandler,mediaType) was not working correctly.  The passed in media type was being dropped.
